better.than: any other providing a public implementation in the literature

has.from sentence: Overall , 3 DDE is better than any other providing a public implementation in the literature .

outperform.from sentence: We also outperform RCN ( without any denoising model ) , a CNN architecture like the one used in 3DDE .

DAN and LAB.from sentence: Even DAN and LAB , that implement a cascade of CNN regressors , can not compete with the regularization obtained by using the cascade of ERT in 3 DDE ( see ) .

large margin.from sentence: In general we are able to improve by a large margin other ERT methods as RCPR , ERT or c GPRT because of the better initialization and the robust features provided by the CNN .

best overall performance.from sentence: Our approach obtains the best overall performance in the indoor and outdoor subsets of the private competition ( see ) and in the full subset of the 300W public test set ( see ) .

300W public competition.from sentence: In the challenging subset of the 300W public competition , SHN gets better results than 3DDE .
